title: [管理][安全]Inventory —— 轻量级的查背包的插件[1.7~1.11]
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-16 17:37 编辑 
一个非常方便和轻量级的管理插件[size=14.6667px]你可以查看玩家背包和他们的末影箱
只有俩个指令/inv 玩家的名字                查看背包/enderchest 玩家的名字     查看末影箱，不输入名字默认是自己
只有俩个权限
- inv.see          看背包[size=14.6667px]- inv.ender        看末影箱[size=14.6667px]
你可以拿或者放一些东西到这些玩家的背包或者末影箱

 
[size=14.6667px]食用方法：[size=14.6667px]- 下载插件并丢到plugin目录- 重启服务器- 享受插件
跟新日志Version 1.3
+ Added enderchests, use /enderchest to see your own enderchest or use /enderchest (Player) to have a look in other enderchests.
+ Fixed minor bugsOcToX, 29 minutes agoNew Inventory +This is the beginning of a small update row to make this plugin easier and more comfortable!
I added an option to warn a Player if his inventory is watching or not 

ty for 220 downloadsOcToX, Today at 2:04 PMAdded config.yml with messages!!!New: config.yml

NOW YOU CAN EDIT the plugin-messages and prefix


下崽



InventoryPlus.jar
